title: Mandy the Alpha Dog: The Chronicles of the K-9 Boys and Girls on Locus Street
description: Mandy: The Alpha Dog features Mandy, the smallest Beagle, and Shadow, the youngest and only non-rescue dog in the pack. Mandy tells the story of her beginning and her overcoming the obstacles of her plight. Shadow the Dalmatian hangs out, and offers comic relief
author: Paula Shene
